bibl.title: The Christian Necropolis of el-Deir in the North of Kharga Oasis.
The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project

bibl.seg: Magali Coudert, The Christian Necropolis of el-Deir in the North of Kharga Oasis.

Roger S. Bagnall, Paola Davoli & Colin A. Hope (edd.), assisted by Bruce E. Parr (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 6. Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 15 (Oxford, 2012) pp. 451-458, 1 fig., 13 pll.
